title: Velvet Assassin
notes: Crashes at startup due to physx error. This is common on windows and resolved with installing Legacy Physx software. Attempted manual install to compatdata's drive_c and appropriate game location. No change. Game has worked in prior versions of wine per info on winehq.

title: Velvet Assassin
notes: Steam client doesn't install Nvidia PhysX

During the first time setup Steam installs Physx twice: first time, version 9.09 from "redist" directory (which is fine), second time,  version 9.12  from "_CommonRedist" directory (which breaks game).
Easy solution: remove (or rename) "_CommonRedist" in the game's root directory BEFORE launching the game for the first time.
If you already launched game and now it crashes due to Physx error, you can remove broken prefix: "<path_to_steam>/steam/steamapps/compatdata/16720/pfx".
title: Velvet Assassin

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 470 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.0-041800-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes: rename __CommonRedist and set launcher options PROTON_NO_D3D11=1, PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%, cutscenes black, work with xbox 360 controller wireless ( using xboxdrv)
title: Velvet Assassin
